onboarding.title: Effortless Onboarding
onboarding.subtitle: Onboarding requires no time from you. We handle 100% of the initial setup and student onboarding.
onboarding.step1Desc: In any format: Excel, PDF, image, notes, or any file. You don't need to prepare anything special or organize data. Just as you have it now works for us.
onboarding.step2Desc: We import your schedules, organize timetables, prepare users, configure roles, and leave everything ready to work. You don't lift a finger.
onboarding.step3Desc: We take care of inviting all your students to the platform, guide them step by step to get in, and teach them how the app works. No complications for you or them.
onboarding.step4Desc: Don't spend hours learning or configuring. While we prepare everything, you focus on what really matters: running your academy and teaching classes.
onboarding.trialDesc1: The 14-day trial starts only when 100% of your students are on the platform.
onboarding.trialDesc2: We guarantee you'll start testing Padelock under real conditions, with your entire academy running.

features.title: More Than a Management Platform
features.subtitle: Padelock integrates security, simplicity, and cutting-edge technology to offer you a complete experience
features.lopiviDesc: Padelock is developed in accordance with the Organic Law on Comprehensive Protection of Children and Adolescents against Violence (LOPIVI). This guarantees that the digital environment in which minors work is safe, responsible, and complies with all current regulations.
features.simpleDesc: No need to be a tech expert. Padelock's interface is designed so anyone can use it without complications, from the first moment. Everything is understood at first glance: clear, direct, and without unnecessary steps.
features.notificationsDesc: Receive instant alerts via WhatsApp and email to stay always informed. Whether you're an administrator, coach, or family member, you'll be aware of every update without needing to enter the platform.
features.webappDesc: Padelock is a WebApp, so you don't need to download or install anything. Simply access from any device through a secure link and enjoy all the features instantly. Works equally well on mobile, tablet, or computer.

hero.subtitle: The first platform specifically designed for padel academies. Manage coaches, classes, and students without complications.

problem.title: Sound familiar?
problem.subtitle: 87% of padel academies manage with Excel, WhatsApp, and paper. The result: operational chaos and lost opportunities.
problem.problem1Desc: Coordinating schedules, managing payments, and manually updating lists consumes valuable time that you could dedicate to what really matters.
problem.problem2Title: Total lack of control over accounts
problem.problem2Desc: No clear visibility on how many active students there really are or how much is being earned. Everything estimated, nothing certain.
problem.problem3Desc: Lack of control in attendance and makeup management generates classes with irregular numbers and inconsistent experience.
problem.problem4Desc: Excel, WhatsApp, and paper convey an amateur image that doesn't reflect the quality of your academy or the level of your coaches.

product.title: Designed for each role
product.subtitle: Academies, coaches, and players have experiences optimized for their specific needs

jugador.benefits: Modern and professional experience that improves satisfaction
